promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic special rabbit steel-type pokemon wearing a ancient crystal headband. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bunystal, a a dynamic special rabbit steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Diamond Blast, Zap Traction. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "steel" or "Bunystal". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, rabbit-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: Residing in rocky highlands, this agile, metallic hare Pokémon excels at Diamond Blast attacks and utilizes Zap Traction to zip through its terrain.
